alert.note: Alert for Northern Campbell (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 4:24PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Campbell County through 500 PM MDT... At 423 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Spotted Horse, or 43 miles northwest of Gillette, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Campbell County, north and west of Recluse. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
